name: ShibaInu-The Game
description:
------Description----

ShibaInu-The Game is a 2D vertical scrolling game where you have to make shib price go as high as possible.  To do that you can:

  • Collect green candles to make the price go up
  • Avoid dangerous red candles to prevent a sell-off
  • Use power-ups (such as whale, hold and others) to make the coin grow faster

With this simple 2D game you'll see the coin virtually going to the moon so that you escape real life for a while and see the price skyrocket extremely fast!

Don't wait more, SHIB needs you to go to the moon! Download now and spread this game among friends so that SHIB will grow more!

---------Donation-----------

Please, if you want, consider making a donation in SHIB, LEASH, BONE or ETH to my wallet:

0x0ea37b6171153c15de55944cF62D2a297C5Bc5A1

It helps me a lot since I'm just a small dev.
Thanks :)
